name: Shrink
doc: odo need single method to set all dims
public_declarations: Self &SetShrinkFactor( unsigned int s ) { this->m_ShrinkFactors = std::vector<unsigned int>(3, s ); return *this; }

members.name: ShrinkFactors
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the shrink factors. Values are clamped to a minimum value of 1. Default is 1 for all dimensions.

briefdescription: Reduce the size of an image by an integer factor in each dimension.
